data.name: TermsStart1
data.value: Terms of Service

data.name: TermsStart2
data.value: Last updated: August 25, 2025

data.name: TermsStart3
data.value: Welcome to Webdiary (the “Service”). These Terms of Service (“Terms”) govern your use of the Service. By accessing or using the Service, you agree to be bound by these Terms. If you do not agree, you must not use the Service.

data.name: TermsMain1
data.value: 1. Purpose of the Service

data.name: TermsMain2
data.value: The Service is a personal diary and note-keeping application built as an educational and demonstration project. It is provided for personal use only and is not intended as a commercial product. The Service may be incomplete, experimental, or unstable.

data.name: TermsMain3
data.value: 2. Eligibility

data.name: TermsMain4
data.value: You must be at least 13 years old to use the Service.

data.name: TermsMain5
data.value: By using the Service, you confirm that you meet this age requirement and have the legal capacity to agree to these Terms.

data.name: TermsMain6
data.value: If you are under 18, you must have the consent of a parent or guardian.

data.name: TermsMain7
data.value: 3. User Accounts

data.name: TermsMain8
data.value: By using the Service, you agree not to:

data.name: TermsMain9
data.value: Use the Service for unlawful purposes.

data.name: TermsMain10
data.value: Upload malicious code, spam, or content that could disrupt the Service.

data.name: TermsMain11
data.value: Attempt to reverse engineer, decompile, or exploit the Service.

data.name: TermsMain12
data.value: Use the Service to store or share content that is illegal, harmful, or offensive.

data.name: TermsMedium1
data.value: 5. Intellectual Property

data.name: TermsMedium2
data.value: The Service and its underlying software were developed as a personal project and remain the intellectual property of the developer.

data.name: TermsMedium3
data.value: You may not copy, modify, distribute, or create derivative works of the Service without explicit permission.

data.name: TermsMedium4
data.value: You retain ownership of the content you create and store within your account.

data.name: TermsMedium5
data.value: 6. Availability and Disclaimer

data.name: TermsMedium6
data.value: The Service is provided “as is” and “as available” without warranties of any kind.

data.name: TermsMedium7
data.value: We do not guarantee uninterrupted access, error-free operation, or data security.

data.name: TermsMedium8
data.value: You understand that this Service may go offline, be discontinued, or experience data loss at any time without notice.

data.name: TermsMedium9
data.value: Use of the Service is at your own risk.

data.name: TermsMedium10
data.value: 7. Limitation of Liability

data.name: TermsMedium11
data.value: To the maximum extent permitted by law:

data.name: TermsMedium12
data.value: The developer is not responsible for any damages, losses, or consequences resulting from your use of the Service.

data.name: TermsMedium13
data.value: This includes, but is not limited to, loss of data, loss of access, or any indirect, incidental, or consequential damages.

data.name: TermsMedium14
data.value: 8. Termination

data.name: TermsMedium15
data.value: We reserve the right to suspend or terminate your access to the Service at any time, without notice, for violations of these Terms or for technical reasons.

data.name: TermsMedium16
data.value: Upon termination, your right to use the Service will cease immediately.

data.name: TermsEnd1
data.value: 9. Changes to the Terms

data.name: TermsEnd2
data.value: We may revise these Terms at any time by posting an updated version within the Service. By continuing to use the Service after revisions are posted, you agree to the updated Terms.

data.name: TermsEnd3
data.value: 10. Governing Law

data.name: TermsEnd4
data.value: These Terms are governed by the laws of Ukraine. Any disputes shall be resolved under the jurisdiction of the courts located in Ukraine.

data.name: TermsEnd5
data.value: 11. Contact Information

data.name: TermsEnd6
data.value: For questions about these Terms, please contact:

data.name: TermsEnd7
data.value: 📧 matveyeresko1@gmail.com

data.name: PrivacyHeader1
data.value: Privacy Policy

data.name: PrivacyHeader2
data.value: Last updated: August 25, 2025

data.name: PrivacyHeader3
data.value: This Privacy Policy describes Our policies and procedures on the collection, use and disclosure of Your information when You use the Service and tells You about Your privacy rights and how the law protects You.

data.name: PrivacyHeader4
data.value: We use Your Personal data to provide and improve the Service. By using the Service, You agree to the collection and use of information in accordance with this Privacy Policy.

data.name: PrivacyHeader5
data.value: Interpretation and Definitions

data.name: PrivacyInterpretation1
data.value: Interpretation

data.name: PrivacyInterpretation2
data.value: The words of which the initial letter is capitalized have meanings defined under the following conditions. The following definitions shall have the same meaning regardless of whether they appear in singular or in plural.

data.name: PrivacyInterpretation3
data.value: Definitions

data.name: PrivacyInterpretation4
data.value: For the purposes of this Privacy Policy:

data.name: PrivacyInterpretation5
data.value: Account

data.name: PrivacyInterpretation6
data.value: Affiliate

data.name: PrivacyInterpretation7
data.value: Company

data.name: PrivacyInterpretation8
data.value: Cookies

data.name: PrivacyInterpretation9
data.value: Country

data.name: PrivacyInterpretation10
data.value: Device

data.value: Personal Data

data.name: PrivacyInterpretation12
data.value: Service

data.name: PrivacyInterpretation13
data.value: Service Provider

data.name: PrivacyInterpretation14
data.value: Usage Data

data.name: PrivacyInterpretation15
data.value: Website

data.name: PrivacyInterpretation16
data.value: You

data.name: PrivacyInterpretation17
data.value: means a unique account created for You to access our Service or parts of our Service.

data.name: PrivacyInterpretation18
data.value: means an entity that controls, is controlled by or is under common control with a party, where "control" means ownership of 50% or more of the shares, equity interest or other securities entitled to vote for election of directors or other managing authority.

data.name: PrivacyInterpretation19
data.value: (referred to as either "the Company", "We", "Us" or "Our" in this Agreement) refers to Webdiary.

data.name: PrivacyInterpretation20
data.value: are small files that are placed on Your computer, mobile device or any other device by a website, containing the details of Your browsing history on that website among its many uses.

data.name: PrivacyInterpretation21
data.value: refers to: Ukraine

data.name: PrivacyInterpretation22
data.value: means any device that can access the Service such as a computer, a cellphone or a digital tablet.

data.name: PrivacyInterpretation23
data.value: is any information that relates to an identified or identifiable individual.

data.name: PrivacyInterpretation24
data.value: refers to the Website.

data.name: PrivacyInterpretation25
data.value: means any natural or legal person who processes the data on behalf of the Company. It refers to third-party companies or individuals employed by the Company to facilitate the Service, to provide the Service on behalf of the Company, to perform services related to the Service or to assist the Company in analyzing how the Service is used.

data.name: PrivacyInterpretation26
data.value: refers to data collected automatically, either generated by the use of the Service or from the Service infrastructure itself (for example, the duration of a page visit).

data.name: PrivacyInterpretation27
data.value: refers to Webdiary, accessible from

data.name: PrivacyInterpretation28
data.value: means the individual accessing or using the Service, or the company, or other legal entity on behalf of which such individual is accessing or using the Service, as applicable.

data.name: PrivacyPersonalData1
data.value: Collecting and Using Your Personal Data

data.name: PrivacyPersonalData2
data.value: Types of Data Collected

data.name: PrivacyPersonalData3
data.value: Personal Data

data.name: PrivacyPersonalData4
data.value: While using Our Service, We may ask You to provide Us with certain personally identifiable information that can be used to contact or identify You. Personally identifiable information may include, but is not limited to:

data.name: PrivacyPersonalData5
data.value: Email address

data.name: PrivacyPersonalData6
data.value: Usage Data

data.name: PrivacyPersonalData7
data.value: Usage Data is collected automatically when using the Service.

data.name: PrivacyPersonalData8
data.value: Usage Data may include information such as Your Device's Internet Protocol address (e.g. IP address), browser type, browser version, the pages of our Service that You visit, the time and date of Your visit, the time spent on those pages, unique device identifiers and other diagnostic data.

data.name: PrivacyPersonalData9
data.value: When You access the Service by or through a mobile device, We may collect certain information automatically, including, but not limited to, the type of mobile device You use, Your mobile device unique ID, the IP address of Your mobile device, Your mobile operating system, the type of mobile Internet browser You use, unique device identifiers and other diagnostic data.

data.name: PrivacyPersonalData10
data.value: We may also collect information that Your browser sends whenever You visit our Service or when You access the Service by or through a mobile device.

data.name: PrivacyPersonalData11
data.value: Tracking Technologies and Cookies

data.name: PrivacyPersonalData12
data.value: We use Cookies and similar tracking technologies to track the activity on Our Service and store certain information. Tracking technologies used are beacons, tags, and scripts to collect and track information and to improve and analyze Our Service. The technologies We use may include:

data.name: PrivacyPersonalData13
data.value: Cookies or Browser Cookies.

data.name: PrivacyPersonalData14
data.value: A cookie is a small file placed on Your Device. You can instruct Your browser to refuse all Cookies or to indicate when a Cookie is being sent. However, if You do not accept Cookies, You may not be able to use some parts of our Service. Unless you have adjusted Your browser setting so that it will refuse Cookies, our Service may use Cookies.

data.name: PrivacyPersonalData15
data.value: Web Beacons.

data.name: PrivacyPersonalData16
data.value: Certain sections of our Service and our emails may contain small electronic files known as web beacons (also referred to as clear gifs, pixel tags, and single-pixel gifs) that permit the Company, for example, to count users who have visited those pages or opened an email and for other related website statistics (for example, recording the popularity of a certain section and verifying system and server integrity).

data.name: PrivacyPersonalData17
data.value: Cookies can be "Persistent" or "Session" Cookies. Persistent Cookies remain on Your personal computer or mobile device when You go offline, while Session Cookies are deleted as soon as You close Your web browser. You can learn more about cookies on

data.name: PrivacyPersonalData18
data.value: TermsFeed website

data.name: PrivacyPersonalData19
data.value: article.

data.name: PrivacyPersonalData20
data.value: We use both Session and Persistent Cookies for the purposes set out below:

data.name: PrivacyPersonalData21
data.value: Necessary / Essential Cookies

data.name: PrivacyPersonalData22
data.value: Type: Session Cookies

data.name: PrivacyPersonalData23
data.value: Administered by: Us

data.name: PrivacyPersonalData24
data.value: Purpose: These Cookies are essential to provide You with services available through the Website and to enable You to use some of its features. They help to authenticate users and prevent fraudulent use of user accounts. Without these Cookies, the services that You have asked for cannot be provided, and We only use these Cookies to provide You with those services.

data.name: PrivacyPersonalData25
data.value: Cookies Policy / Notice Acceptance Cookies

data.name: PrivacyPersonalData26
data.value: Type: Persistent Cookies

data.name: PrivacyPersonalData27
data.value: Administered by: Us

data.name: PrivacyPersonalData28
data.value: Purpose: These Cookies identify if users have accepted the use of cookies on the Website.

data.name: PrivacyPersonalData29
data.value: Functionality Cookies

data.name: PrivacyPersonalData30
data.value: Type: Persistent Cookies

data.name: PrivacyPersonalData31
data.value: Administered by: Us

data.name: PrivacyPersonalData32
data.value: Purpose: These Cookies allow us to remember choices You make when You use the Website, such as remembering your login details or language preference. The purpose of these Cookies is to provide You with a more personal experience and to avoid You having to re-enter your preferences every time You use the Website.

data.name: PrivacyPersonalData33
data.value: For more information about the cookies we use and your choices regarding cookies, please visit our Cookies Policy or the Cookies section of our Privacy Policy.

data.name: PrivacyDataUsage1
data.value: Use of Your Personal Data

data.name: PrivacyDataUsage2
data.value: The Company may use Personal Data for the following purposes:

data.name: PrivacyDataUsage3
data.value: To provide and maintain our Service

data.name: PrivacyDataUsage4
data.value: , including to monitor the usage of our Service.

data.name: PrivacyDataUsage5
data.value: To manage Your Account:

data.name: PrivacyDataUsage6
data.value: to manage Your registration as a user of the Service. The Personal Data You provide can give You access to different functionalities of the Service that are available to You as a registered user.

data.name: PrivacyDataUsage7
data.value: For the performance of a contract:

data.name: PrivacyDataUsage8
data.value: the development, compliance and undertaking of the purchase contract for the products, items or services You have purchased or of any other contract with Us through the Service.

data.name: PrivacyDataUsage9
data.value: To contact You:

data.name: PrivacyDataUsage10
data.value: To contact You by email, telephone calls, SMS, or other equivalent forms of electronic communication, such as a mobile application's push notifications regarding updates or informative communications related to the functionalities, products or contracted services, including the security updates, when necessary or reasonable for their implementation.

data.name: PrivacyDataUsage11
data.value: To provide You

data.name: PrivacyDataUsage12
data.value: with news, special offers and general information about other goods, services and events which we offer that are similar to those that you have already purchased or enquired about unless You have opted not to receive such information.

data.name: PrivacyDataUsage13
data.value: To manage Your requests:

data.name: PrivacyDataUsage14
data.value: To attend and manage Your requests to Us.

data.name: PrivacyDataUsage15
data.value: For business transfers:

data.name: PrivacyDataUsage16
data.value: We may use Your information to evaluate or conduct a merger, divestiture, restructuring, reorganization, dissolution, or other sale or transfer of some or all of Our assets, whether as a going concern or as part of bankruptcy, liquidation, or similar proceeding, in which Personal Data held by Us about our Service users is among the assets transferred.

data.name: PrivacyDataUsage17
data.value: For other purposes

data.name: PrivacyDataUsage18
data.value: : We may use Your information for other purposes, such as data analysis, identifying usage trends, determining the effectiveness of our promotional campaigns and to evaluate and improve our Service, products, services, marketing and your experience.

data.name: PrivacyDataUsage19
data.value: We may share Your personal information in the following situations:

data.name: PrivacyDataUsage20
data.value: With Service Providers:

data.name: PrivacyDataUsage21
data.value: We may share Your personal information with Service Providers to monitor and analyze the use of our Service, to contact You.

data.name: PrivacyDataUsage22
data.value: For business transfers:

data.name: PrivacyDataUsage23
data.value: We may share or transfer Your personal information in connection with, or during negotiations of, any merger, sale of Company assets, financing, or acquisition of all or a portion of Our business to another company.

data.name: PrivacyDataUsage24
data.value: With Affiliates:

data.name: PrivacyDataUsage25
data.value: We may share Your information with Our affiliates, in which case we will require those affiliates to honor this Privacy Policy. Affiliates include Our parent company and any other subsidiaries, joint venture partners or other companies that We control or that are under common control with Us.

data.name: PrivacyDataUsage26
data.value: With business partners:

data.name: PrivacyDataUsage27
data.value: We may share Your information with Our business partners to offer You certain products, services or promotions.

data.name: PrivacyDataUsage28
data.value: With other users:

data.name: PrivacyDataUsage29
data.value: when You share personal information or otherwise interact in the public areas with other users, such information may be viewed by all users and may be publicly distributed outside.

data.name: PrivacyDataUsage30
data.value: With Your consent

data.name: PrivacyDataUsage31
data.value: : We may disclose Your personal information for any other purpose with Your consent.

data.name: PrivacyDataUsage32
data.value: Retention of Your Personal Data

data.name: PrivacyDataUsage33
data.value: The Company will retain Your Personal Data only for as long as is necessary for the purposes set out in this Privacy Policy. We will retain and use Your Personal Data to the extent necessary to comply with our legal obligations (for example, if we are required to retain your data to comply with applicable laws), resolve disputes, and enforce our legal agreements and policies.

data.name: PrivacyDataUsage34
data.value: The Company will also retain Usage Data for internal analysis purposes. Usage Data is generally retained for a shorter period of time, except when this data is used to strengthen the security or to improve the functionality of Our Service, or We are legally obligated to retain this data for longer time periods.

data.name: PrivacyDataUsage35
data.value: Transfer of Your Personal Data

data.name: PrivacyDataUsage36
data.value: Your information, including Personal Data, is processed at the Company's operating offices and in any other places where the parties involved in the processing are located. It means that this information may be transferred to — and maintained on — computers located outside of Your state, province, country or other governmental jurisdiction where the data protection laws may differ than those from Your jurisdiction.

data.name: PrivacyDataUsage37
data.value: Your consent to this Privacy Policy followed by Your submission of such information represents Your agreement to that transfer.

data.name: PrivacyDataUsage38
data.value: The Company will take all steps reasonably necessary to ensure that Your data is treated securely and in accordance with this Privacy Policy and no transfer of Your Personal Data will take place to an organization or a country unless there are adequate controls in place including the security of Your data and other personal information.

data.name: PrivacyDataUsage39
data.value: Delete Your Personal Data

data.name: PrivacyDataUsage40
data.value: You have the right to delete or request that We assist in deleting the Personal Data that We have collected about You.

data.name: PrivacyDataUsage41
data.value: Our Service may give You the ability to delete certain information about You from within the Service.

data.name: PrivacyDataUsage42
data.value: You may update, amend, or delete Your information at any time by signing in to Your Account, if you have one, and visiting the account settings section that allows you to manage Your personal information. You may also contact Us to request access to, correct, or delete any personal information that You have provided to Us.

data.name: PrivacyDataUsage43
data.value: Please note, however, that We may need to retain certain information when we have a legal obligation or lawful basis to do so.

data.name: PrivacyDataUsage44
data.value: Disclosure of Your Personal Data

data.name: PrivacyDataUsage45
data.value: Business Transactions

data.name: PrivacyDataUsage46
data.value: If the Company is involved in a merger, acquisition or asset sale, Your Personal Data may be transferred. We will provide notice before Your Personal Data is transferred and becomes subject to a different Privacy Policy.

data.name: PrivacyDataUsage47
data.value: Law enforcement

data.name: PrivacyDataUsage48
data.value: Under certain circumstances, the Company may be required to disclose Your Personal Data if required to do so by law or in response to valid requests by public authorities (e.g. a court or a government agency).

data.name: PrivacyDataUsage49
data.value: Other legal requirements

data.name: PrivacyDataUsage50
data.value: The Company may disclose Your Personal Data in the good faith belief that such action is necessary to:

data.name: PrivacyDataUsage51
data.value: Comply with a legal obligation

data.name: PrivacyDataUsage52
data.value: Protect and defend the rights or property of the Company

data.name: PrivacyDataUsage53
data.value: Prevent or investigate possible wrongdoing in connection with the Service

data.name: PrivacyDataUsage54
data.value: Protect the personal safety of Users of the Service or the public

data.name: PrivacyDataUsage55
data.value: Protect against legal liability

data.name: PrivacyDataUsage56
data.value: Security of Your Personal Data

data.name: PrivacyDataUsage57
data.value: The security of Your Personal Data is important to Us, but remember that no method of transmission over the Internet, or method of electronic storage is 100% secure. While We strive to use commercially acceptable means to protect Your Personal Data, We cannot guarantee its absolute security.

data.name: PrivacyEnd1
data.value: Children's Privacy

data.name: PrivacyEnd2
data.value: Our Service does not address anyone under the age of 13. We do not knowingly collect personally identifiable information from anyone under the age of 13. If You are a parent or guardian and You are aware that Your child has provided Us with Personal Data, please contact Us. If We become aware that We have collected Personal Data from anyone under the age of 13 without verification of parental consent, We take steps to remove that information from Our servers.

data.name: PrivacyEnd3
data.value: If We need to rely on consent as a legal basis for processing Your information and Your country requires consent from a parent, We may require Your parent's consent before We collect and use that information.

data.name: PrivacyEnd4
data.value: Links to Other Websites

data.name: PrivacyEnd5
data.value: Our Service may contain links to other websites that are not operated by Us. If You click on a third party link, You will be directed to that third party's site. We strongly advise You to review the Privacy Policy of every site You visit.

data.name: PrivacyEnd6
data.value: We have no control over and assume no responsibility for the content, privacy policies or practices of any third party sites or services.

data.name: PrivacyEnd7
data.value: Changes to this Privacy Policy

data.name: PrivacyEnd8
data.value: We may update Our Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify You of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page.

data.name: PrivacyEnd9
data.value: We will let You know via email and/or a prominent notice on Our Service, prior to the change becoming effective and update the "Last updated" date at the top of this Privacy Policy.

data.name: PrivacyEnd10
data.value: You are advised to review this Privacy Policy periodically for any changes. Changes to this Privacy Policy are effective when they are posted on this page.

data.name: PrivacyEnd11
data.value: Contact Us

data.name: PrivacyEnd12
data.value: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, You can contact us:

data.name: PrivacyEnd13
data.value: By email: matveyeresko1@gmail.com
